fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, External Relations
eu_initiatives:
KSAT Works together with the Norwegian Space Centre on the initiative for the Copernicus Integrated ground segment. 
KSAT also participated at the EU space strategy symposium this year, and plans to participate at the nest symposium. 
KSAT delivers an oil spill and maritime safety service to the EMSA.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Search and Rescue Galileo Operations Advisory Board#E02670#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2670#Observer#C
membership: KSAT is a member of the European Association of Remote Sensing Companies (EARSC).
goals__remit:
Kongsberg Satellite Services AS (KSAT) is a commercial Norwegian company, providing services for satellite operations and data utilisation. The ground segment consists of a global network of ground stations, including stations in Tromsø, Svalbard, Antarctica, Inuvik, Dubai, Singapore, Mauritius and South-Africa among others. KSAT communicates with more than 100 satellites every day and has 24 000 contacts every month.  
KSAT also delivers unbiased multi-mission near real-time satellite data and services, including oil spill, ship detection and ice information. KSAT has in-house processing capability for operational radar satellites. KSAT is the prime operator of the ESA Sentinel Core Ground Segment.
relevant_communication:
KSAT has been a partner in the recently completed R&D Project PolarIce, focusing on the use of Earth observation to meet the demand for Access to updated information from the Arctic. 
KSAT has also been partner and coordinator of previous Earth observation R&D framework program Projects, especially focussed on maritime Applications.
position: Senior Vice President, strategy and relations
